pro remove_data_from_database ;load the db data ; find index of all sensors which aren't aatsr or atsr2 ; create a new db structure and fill with good values ;sav the new db data as the database ;-------------------------- ; LOAD THE DATABASE DB_FILE = GET_DIMITRI_LOCATION('DATABASE') DB_TEMPLATE = GET_DIMITRI_TEMPLATE(1,/TEMPLATE) DHMI_DB_DATA = READ_ASCII(DB_FILE,TEMPLATE=DB_TEMPLATE) res = where(DHMI_DB_DATA.sensor ne 'VEGETATION',count) new_db_data = GET_DIMITRI_TEMPLATE(count,/db) num_tags = n_tags(new_db_data) for i=0l,num_tags-1l do new_db_data.(i)[*] = DHMI_DB_DATA.(i)[res] res = SAVE_DIMITRI_DATABASE(new_db_data) end
